Displays help on commands.
Usage: <cmd> --all  displays complete command list.
Usage: <cmd> -group displays only commands related to group
Usage: <cmd> [commandname]

Example: <cmd> -site
Example: <cmd> --all

Valid groups: general, site, auto, route, rank, speed, work, rip, stats, slots, misc, news, irc, rules, indexer, info, reload, socks5, pretime, imdb, tv, test, section

Note:  --a, -all, -a also displays complete command list.
